ygData.subject: RE: /auc Looking to buy a clue
ygData.msgSnippet: ... True, but you have to admit it s better than That s the way it s supposed to work. I suppose someone with a video camera will have to tape themselves
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 8 Dec 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> The words: "I will take a look at this" are missing. I don't get the
> feeling that GZ recognizes it as a bug. My read is that he is brushing it

True, but you have to admit it's better than "That's the way
it's supposed to work."

I suppose someone with a video camera will have to tape
themselves playing Lullaby on ultra-green mobs, and play it in
slow motion to get some hard data on its effectiveness. Or if
you can pick mobs without double/dual-attack, you could figure
it from just the log file.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
